meanings.definition: A group of muscles located in the lower back and pelvis.
meanings.sent1: The psoae help support the lower back when lifting heavy objects.
meanings.sent2: Physical therapists often recommend exercises to strengthen the psoae.
meanings.sent3: During the dance class, the instructor joked that our psoae were getting a good workout.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was like the psoae, quietly providing strength and stability.
meanings.sent5: The psoae, like hidden pillars, silently uphold the body's core.

meanings.definition: The plural form of psoas, a muscle in the lumbar region of the vertebral column.
meanings.sent1: After the surgery, the doctor mentioned that both psoae were healing well.
meanings.sent2: Athletes often focus on stretching their psoae to prevent injuries.
meanings.sent3: The twins joked that their psoae were like a secret handshake between them.
meanings.sent4: His dedication to his craft was evident in the strength of his psoae.
meanings.sent5: The psoae, like loyal companions, support the spine through every movement.
